briefTitle: A Randomized Placebo-Controlled Trial of Manuka Honey for Oral Mucositis Due to Radiation Therapy for Cancer
officialTitle: A Randomized Placebo-Controlled Trial of Manuka Honey for Oral Mucositis Due to Radiation Therapy for Cancer
summary: The primary hypothesis of this study is that regular topical oral application of Manuka Honey will reduce the severity and duration of oral mucositis in patients who are undergoing mucotoxic radiation therapy for cancer treatment.

primaryOutcome.measure: Severity of Mucositis According to the Radiation Therapy Oncology Group (RTOG) for Patients Who Had at Least One Mucositis Assessment
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Over 7 weeks of expected duration of mucositis
